sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import socketIOClient from "socket.io-client"; const ENDPOINT = "http://localhost:5000"; function FriendSidebar() { const [contact, setContact] = useState([]); const socket = socketIOClient(ENDPOINT); useEffect(() => { socket.emit("GetContacts"); socket.on("retrive GetContacts", (contacts) => { setContact(contacts); }); }, []); return (
Friends
    {contact && contact.map((user) => { if (user.chat_type === 0) { chat_name = user.name; chat_initial = chat_name.substring(0, 1);
  • Harrietta Souten

    {chat_name}

    New chat Profile
    Block
    • ; } })}

); } export default FriendSidebar;
